thread.title: A bold new look for Ferrari
thread.title_full: A bold new look for Ferrari

title: A bold new look for Ferrari
text:
Get Sky F1 F1 Testing: A bold new look for Kimi Raikkonen's Ferrari Large rear rakes were attached to the SF70 on Day Two of the final test in Barcelona to make the Ferrari look rather alien... Last Updated: 08/03/17 10:38am It's a Ferrari, as you've never seen it before! 
To begin Day Two of the final Winter Test in Barcelona, Kimi Raikkonen's SF70-H was fitted with large aero sensors as the Scuderia looked to collect more data before the 2017 season starts. 
Pre-season testing is often the time for aerodynamic parts to be trialled, but we've never seen rear additions quite as big as these... 
Raikkonen completed just a few laps with the rakes attached, before starting his longer runs. 
It's been an impressive few weeks of testing for Ferrari so far, and they'll look to continue their progress - with the aero sensors, and without. 
The Sky Sports F1 Digital team will be providing live commentary from dawn until dusk for all days of winter testing while Sky Sports News HQ will also deliver live updates from trackside.
